content.text: Match ends, Sporting de Gijón 2, Mallorca 0.
Second Half ends, Sporting de Gijón 2, Mallorca 0.
Attempt blocked. Alberto Lora (Sporting de Gijón) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Mate Bilic (Sporting de Gijón) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alberto Lora.
Attempt missed. Pierre Webó (Mallorca) left footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Nsue.
Offside, Sporting de Gijón. Carmelo tries a through ball, but Mate Bilic is caught offside.
Attempt missed. David Barral (Sporting de Gijón) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Alberto Rivera with a cross.

Goal!  Sporting de Gijón 2, Mallorca 0. Diego Castro (Sporting de Gijón) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
